page.title: 20The Maltby Survey Team
page.content: The 1985 Domesday Survey of Maltby and district was shared by the staff and pupils of three schools:Maltby Crags and Lilly Hall Primary Schools and Maltby Comprehensive School.The text includes contributions from J.Asbery, C.Cardow,C.Coldwell,K.Gavin,P.Gormley, R.Hatton,J.Noble,R.Read,J.Townsley, R.Walker,C.Wilson,E.Wright and P.Yeomans. Co-ordination by P.J.Wagland and technical assistance by H.W.Roe. Thanks are due to the many who helped with this project,especially Maltby Local History Society (Secretary Mrs A.Rodgers) for the loan of Aerial photographs of the district.Also to Mr P.Brookes of Maltby Crags School and Mr J.Hind of Lilly Hall School.
